Rule.Text: IIT-Kanpur students to go on 12-hour 'mass fast' tomorrow

The en masse hunger strike would be held in front of the statue of Mahatma Gandhi at Phool Bagh and if the district administration denied permission, the venue would be the Town Hall, spokesman for the 'Forum for Indians against Reservation' Rahul 'Bharat' said.
IIT-Kanpur students to go on 12-hour 'mass fast' tomorrow

Kanpur, June. 17 (PTI): Students of the Indian Institute of Technology-Kanpur have decided on a 12-hour "mass fast" here tomorrow against the proposed OBC quotas in institutions of higher learning even as their relay hunger strike entered the 21st day today.

The en masse hunger strike would be held in front of the statue of Mahatma Gandhi at Phool Bagh and if the district administration denied permission, the venue would be the Town Hall, spokesman for the 'Forum for Indians against Reservation' Rahul 'Bharat' said.
He said well-known motivational guru Shiv Khera had consented to attend the programme.

Rahul 'Bharat' said the relay fast by IIT-K students continued for the 21st day and students of other IITs and institutes of higher learning had extended full support to the movement against reservation in higher education.
The sit-in and demonstration by students and junior doctors of GSVM Medical College during lunch hours entered its fifth day.

Send MPs' delegation to Sri Lanka : Vaiko

MADURAI:
The Marumalarchi Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (MDMK) general secretary Vaiko has appealed to Prime Minister Manmohan Singh to direct the armed forces along the coastline of Tamil Nadu to help Sri Lankan Tamil refugees stranded at sea to reach the shores.

The first part of the business plan should be geared towards helping develop and support solid business strategy. The plan should explain the market, the industry, target customers and competitors. Write about customer needs and the benefits of the current products and services. Evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of each competing firm and draw out the opportunities for your product or service in the marketplace. All of these steps largely aim to help you in creating a strategy for your business. The second half of the business plan should explain how to execute your selected business strategy. Your products and services, your marketing and operations should all closely tie in with your strategy. Have a strategy that will set the course for your business ratherthan having a smart-sounding strategy for your plan,
